item.title: Animation Changer
item.description: Animation Changer, allows the player to change their current character animation to the selected one.
item.content:encoded: Animation Changer, allows the player to change their current character animation to the selected one.

item.title: Camera Zoom
item.description: Camera zoom allows the user to change their camera zoom to their desired value.
item.content:encoded: Camera zoom allows the user to change their camera zoom to their desired value.

item.title: Constellation Modifier
item.description: Sponsor Only Constellation Modifier, will change your active character constellations if selected, visually and some of them will actually work. You can find more information ab...
item.content:encoded:
Sponsor Only

Constellation Modifier, will change your active character constellations if selected, visually and some of them will actually work.

  • You can find more information about which of them work at #â cons-check in the server.

You have to switch to each character you want to activate the constellations first and then teleport far away to activate them.

Example Video:

item.title: Custom Profile
item.description: Custom Profile: UID: Select the UID you want to be displayed.; Nickname: Select the Nickname you want to be displayed.; Level: Select the Level you want to be displayed.; EXP: S...
item.content:encoded:
Custom Profile:

UID:

  • Select the UID you want to be displayed.

Nickname:

  • Select the Nickname you want to be displayed.

Level:

  • Select the Level you want to be displayed.

EXP:

  • Select the EXP you want to be displayed.

World Level:

  • Select the World Level you want to be displayed.

Avatar Image:

  • Use a custom png as avatar image.

Card Image:

  • Use a custom png as card image.

item.title: Custom Weather
item.description: Custom Wether allows you to change the weather to your liking.
item.content:encoded: Custom Wether allows you to change the weather to your liking.

item.title: Emotion Changer
item.description: Emotion Changer allows the player to change the current character emotion to the selected one.
item.content:encoded: Emotion Changer allows the player to change the current character emotion to the selected one.

item.title: Extra Visual Settings
item.description: Extra Visual Settings: Gamma: Allows you to change the gamma value of the game.; Outline Width: Allows you to change the outline of every character in the game.; Anti-Aliasing: ...
item.content:encoded:
Extra Visual Settings:

Gamma:

  • Allows you to change the gamma value of the game.

Outline Width:

  • Allows you to change the outline of every character in the game.

Anti-Aliasing:

  • Allows the player to change the anti-aliasing module to use, including some that are not available natively.

item.title: Fake Time
item.description: Fake Time: Changes in game time (hour and minutes).;
item.content:encoded:
Fake Time:

  • Changes in game time (hour and minutes).

item.title: Flycloak Modifier
item.description: Flycloak Modifier allow the player to change their glider skin even if they don't own it.
item.content:encoded: Flycloak Modifier allow the player to change their glider skin even if they don't own it.

item.title: FPS Unlock
item.description: Unlocks FPS.Unlocks FPS yeah.Unlocks FPS wow. Limit background FPS: Set the max fps game can reach when its not focused.;
item.content:encoded:
Unlocks FPS.Unlocks FPS yeah.Unlocks FPS wow.

Limit background FPS:

  • Set the max fps game can reach when its not focused.

item.title: Free Camera
item.description: Free Camera: Move the camera freely without being locked to the character.; Freeze Character Animation: Freezes character animations.; Make Character Invisible: Makes character ...
item.content:encoded:
Free Camera:

  • Move the camera freely without being locked to the character.

Freeze Character Animation:

  • Freezes character animations.

Make Character Invisible:

  • Makes character invisible.

Block User Input:

  • Blocks user input therefore character wont move while moving the camera.

item.title: Hide UI
item.description: Hide UI: Hides player user interface entirely.; Hide Ping: (Sponsor) Hides ping only.; Hide HP Bar: (Sponsor) Hides current character HP bar only.; Hide Team HP Bar: (Sponsor) H...
item.content:encoded:
Hide UI:

  • Hides player user interface entirely.

Hide Ping: (Sponsor)

  • Hides ping only.

Hide HP Bar: (Sponsor)

  • Hides current character HP bar only.

Hide Team HP Bar: (Sponsor)

  • Hides team hp bar on the character tab only.

Video:

item.title: Map Zoom
item.description: Map Zoom modifies the values to be used in the map.
item.content:encoded: Map Zoom modifies the values to be used in the map.

item.title: Monster Changer
item.description: Monster Changer: When enabled, all new rendered monsters will be changed visually to the selected monster.; Exclude Animals: Enable or Disable changing animals.; Custom Monster ...
item.content:encoded:
Monster Changer:

  • When enabled, all new rendered monsters will be changed visually to the selected monster.

Exclude Animals:

  • Enable or Disable changing animals.

Custom Monster ID:

  • Use ID instead of the provided list.

Randomize Monster:

  • The change will be random.

item.title: Skin Modifier
item.description: Skin Modifier allows the player to use in-game skins for free.
item.content:encoded: Skin Modifier allows the player to use in-game skins for free.

item.title: Texture Changer
item.description: Its better to use GIMI (../../guide/3DM-tutorial.md) for changing textures. Texture Changer allows to switch character parts to the provided .png files.
item.content:encoded:
Its better to use [GIMI](../../guide/3DM-tutorial.md) for changing textures.

Texture Changer allows to switch character parts to the provided .png files.

item.title: Auto Activate Teleport
item.description: Sponsor Only Auto Activate Teleport activates nearby waypoints up to 50m. Example Video:

Sponsor Only

Auto Activate Teleport activates nearby waypoints up to 50m.

item.title: Auto Challenge
item.description: Auto Challenge lets you complete the current active time trial within a specified range and delay time, you can configure these to your liking. Example Video: Note: Not recommen...
item.content:encoded:
Auto Challenge lets you complete the current active time trial within a specified range and delay time, you can configure these to your liking.

Example Video:

Note: Not recommended to use in low delays and very high ranges.

item.title: Auto Cook
item.description: Auto Cook lets you cook a specified quantity and quality of the selected food on the cooking page, it counts with an auto proficiency (Auto unlock auto cook) built-in. Example V...
item.content:encoded:
Auto Cook lets you cook a specified quantity and quality of the selected food on the cooking page, it counts with an auto proficiency (Auto unlock auto cook) built-in.

Example Video:

item.title: Auto Destroy Objects
item.description: Auto Destroy Objects lets you destroy customizable objects within a specified range, in which it includes, ores, plants, rock piles, chests, special objects, shields, etc. Examp...
item.content:encoded:
Auto Destroy Objects lets you destroy customizable objects within a specified range, in which it includes, ores, plants, rock piles, chests, special objects, shields, etc.

Example Video:

Note: Recommended value is below 20m, not recommended to use at max range (40m)

item.title: Auto Fish
item.description: Auto fish lets you skip the catching fish animation, which will reduce the time needed to catch a fish. Example Video: Note: Auto Recast is not working at the time creating this...
item.content:encoded:
Auto fish lets you skip the catching fish animation, which will reduce the time needed to catch a fish.

Example Video:

Note: Auto Recast is not working at the time creating this post.

item.title: Auto Loot
item.description: Auto loot lets you auto collect loot withing the selected range and delay, the loot that will be collected can be customized, including chests, mob drops and more. Example Video...
item.content:encoded:
Auto loot lets you auto collect loot withing the selected range and delay, the loot that will be collected can be customized, including chests, mob drops and more.

Example Video:

Note: Recommended below 10m for normal use and 20m if using custom tp. Note 2: Higher the distance higher delay should be used.

item.title: Auto Seelie
item.description: Auto Seelie removes the necesity of the player to follow the seelie constantly, seelie with go to the designed destination when the player gets close. Example Video:
item.content:encoded:
Auto Seelie removes the necesity of the player to follow the seelie constantly, seelie with go to the designed destination when the player gets close.

Example Video:

item.title: Auto Talk
item.description: Auto Talk: Talks automatically with the NPCs Fast Dialog: Speeds up the game with the selected value to make the dialog faster.; Note: Not recommended to use above 5. Skip Dialo...
item.content:encoded:
Auto Talk: Talks automatically with the NPCs

Fast Dialog:

  • Speeds up the game with the selected value to make the dialog faster.

Note: Not recommended to use above 5.

Skip Dialog (Sponsor):

  • Skips the dialog with the selected delay. Its safer than fast dialog.

Note: Not recommended to use below 200ms

Fast Cutscene:

  • Speeds up the game with the selected value to make the cutscene faster.

Note: Not recommended to use above 5

Skip Talk Scenes:

  • Skips a talk scene if its triggered or on-going.

Note: Might get black screen while using it.

Skip Cutscene:

  • Skips a Cutscene if its triggered or on-going.

Note: Might get black screen while using it.

Example Video:

item.title: Auto Tree Farm
item.description: Sponsor Only Auto Tree Farm lets you punch nearby trees with the selected value and delay, therefore automatically getting wood from nearby trees. Example Video: Note: Not recom...
item.content:encoded:
Sponsor Only

Auto Tree Farm lets you punch nearby trees with the selected value and delay, therefore automatically getting wood from nearby trees.

Example Video:

Note: Not recommended to change default values.

item.title: Elemental Aura
item.description: Sponsor Only Elemental Aura applies elements with the specified element, range and delay to targets, objects or yourself, multiple elements can be applied to nearby targets. Exa...
item.content:encoded:
Sponsor Only

Elemental Aura applies elements with the specified element, range and delay to targets, objects or yourself, multiple elements can be applied to nearby targets.

Example Video:

Note: Low delay times will increase the chance of detection.

item.title: Game Speed
item.description: Game Speed. Speedups or slowdowns the game. Unexpected. Note: Not recommended to use outside of menus, or in general. Example Video:
item.content:encoded:
Game Speed. Speedups or slowdowns the game. Unexpected.

Note: Not recommended to use outside of menus, or in general.

Example Video:

item.title: Kill Aura
item.description: This feature has a high risk of ban. Kill Aura: Deals damage to surrounding enemies Crash Damage mode: Deals fall damage to surrounding enemies with the specified value, delay a...
item.content:encoded:
This feature has a high risk of ban.

Kill Aura: Deals damage to surrounding enemies

Crash Damage mode:

  • Deals fall damage to surrounding enemies with the specified value, delay and range.

Note: Not recommended to use very high values.

Percent Mode:

  • Number of hits needed to kill an enemy.

Note: Recommended to use 3 or higher values.

Left HP:

  • Whether or not to leave the specified amount of HP to surrounding enemies.

Instant Death Mode:

  • Will try to make the enemy disappear

Note: Might get buggy with some bosses. Note 2: Not recommended to use.

Only Hostile/Aggro:

  • Whether or not to target only hostile mobs.

Example Video:

item.description: Mob Vacuum move nearby mobs to the player with the selected speed and range, the mobs that will be affected can be customized. Example Video: Note: Recommended below 20m.
item.content:encoded:
